fullDescription.intro:
AMBIT's tautomer generator to enumerate viable tautomers for CDK molecules. Either the single most viable tautomer or all possible tautomers can be generated.
Ambit-Tautomer: An Open Source Tool for Tautomer Generation. DOI: 10.1002/minf.201200133
fullDescription.option: Select the column that contains molecules.
Whether all tautomers or just the best should be generated.
